external_games.name: Three Kingdoms The Last Warlord-The Age of Turbulence

name: Three Kingdoms: The Last Warlord - The Age of Turbulence
summary: In the last years of the Han Dynasty, the empire was plunged into long-term chaos and turmoil. The warlords fought with each other; bandits run rampant; foreign races disturbed the frontiers; ancient beasts seem to be coming to the world soon...
